description: Tests workflow-to-workflow invocation (sub-workflows). The parent workflow invokes a child workflow to transform data, then generates a summary.
query: Please use the WorkflowCompositionParent to process the value 25, and render the output file.

evaluation.expected_response: The WorkflowCompositionParent has successfully processed the value 25. The parent workflow invoked the DataProcessingSubWorkflow to transform the data (25 + 10 = 35), then generated a summary. Summary: Value 25 transformed to 35 (difference: 10). Results: Original: 25, Transformed: 35, Difference: 10
evaluation.criterion: Evaluate if the orchestrator successfully delegated to WorkflowCompositionParent, the parent workflow invoked DataProcessingSubWorkflow, the sub-workflow transformed 25â†’35, and the summary was generated correctly.
